Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Scattershot:



Koga Shuko activated the intercom.  ~All forces, meet me outside of the ship. 
 We are ready to attack~
<BH, have your men stay where they are, we are coming out>


Koga Shuko, Unitron, Anubis, and Hades all exited the ship, the time for 
destruction was now.

===========

Scattershot's left optic twitched.  "Reeeally.  How coincidental Zardus never 
told us about reinforcements, and I've been on the Alliance's side for 20 
stellar-cycles (years) and I've never seen you!" Scattershot screamed, taking 
out his missile launcher, firing a rocket at Firestorm.
